/* LibraryMapper.getLibraryList */
SELECT twbi.TITLE, twbi.USER_NM, twbi.REG_DT, twbi.BOARD_CD, twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO, twbi.USER_ID
FROM TB_WB_BOARD_INFO twbi WHERE 1=1 AND twbi.BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND twbi.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND twbi.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
AND twbi.USER_NM LIKE '%'||#{gubunName}||'%'
ORDER BY twbi.BOARD_CD, twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO

/* LibraryMapper.getLibraryDetailAtchList */ SELECT twbi.TITLE, twba.ORGINL_FILE_NM, twba.FILE_NM, twba.FILE_EXT FROM TB_WB_BOARD_ATCH twba, TB_WB_BOARD_INFO twbi WHERE 1=1 AND twba.BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND twba.BOARD_SEQ_NO = #{boardSeqNo} AND twba.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twbi.BOARD_CD (+)= twba.BOARD_CD AND twbi.BOARD_SEQ_NO (+)= twba.BOARD_SEQ_NO ORDER BY twba.BOARD_CD, twba.BOARD_SEQ_NO, twba.IDX

/* LibraryMapper.getLibraryInfoList */ SELECT twba.IDX, (twba.ORGINL_FILE_NM || '.' || twba.FILE_EXT) AS ORGINL_FILE_NM, '삭제' AS DEL FROM TB_WB_BOARD_ATCH twba WHERE 1=1 AND twba.BOARD_CD = #{boardCd} AND twba.BOARD_SEQ_NO = #{boardSeqNo} AND twba.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY twba.BOARD_CD, twba.BOARD_SEQ_NO, twba.IDX

/* LibraryMapper.getBoardUserNm */ SELECT tce.USER_NM FROM ( ( --본사 SELECT USER_ID, EMP_NM AS USER_NM FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 ) UNION ALL ( --매장 SELECT USER_ID, EMP_NM AS USER_NM FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 ) UNION ALL ( --관리자,총판 SELECT USER_ID, EMP_NM AS USER_NM FROM TB_CM_EMPLOYEE WHERE 1=1 ) ) tce WHERE 1=1 AND tce.USER_ID = #{userId}
